name: The 15th International Conference on Management, Economics and Humanities
content: The 15th International Conference on Management, Economics, and Humanities, June 14-16, 2024 in Nice, France aims to bring together academia, researchers, and scholars to exchange information and share experiences and research results about all aspects of specialized and interdisciplinary fields. This event provides an opportunity for all to network, share ideas, and present their research to a worldwide community. Discussion on the latest innovations, trends and practical concerns and challenges faced in these fields are also encouraged. With ICMEH, we encourage the community of multinational researchers to share common experiences and discussions. We are delighted to announce that the conference has established a great and friendly community of multinational researchers who are fond of sharing their common experiences In this regard, the scientific and executive committees of the Conference kindly invite all professors, researchers and executive officials to submit, individually or in partnership with other researchers, their valuable articles comprising the latest scientific and research findings on the main or related themes and topics of the Conference to the Conference Secretariat.
